EmailTemplate.description: HTML general template for The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.name: Birmingham University Focus Group
EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting opportunity with the University of Birmingham!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network / Society
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
Do you want the chance to change what is taught in schools and have a personalized tour of the University of Birmingham?
Come and take part in a focus group on how schools can develop character in young people followed by a tour of the University of Birmingham and some free food!
When: Wednesday 15th May at 5.30pm
Spaces are limited so email emma.crump@the-challenge.org by Monday 13th May to take part!
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG/GRADUATES /thechallengesociety
